Articles.Content:
I feel the need to pop in here every couple of months and once again emphasize HOW MUCH I LOVE THIS FREAKING CAPSULE.

Glad to hear you're keeping it updated, CBBP!!!!!
so the one Part does not really work when involved with other parts lol. does anyone care?

so the one Part does not really work when involved with other parts lol. does anyone care?

Are you saying that you'll have to split the capsule up into multiple parts? I don't mind, if that's what you're asking about.
No i am saying if ou have it docked its RCS will look wonky it will still behave correctly. It jsut will look like it is not.

No i am saying if ou have it docked its RCS will look wonky it will still behave correctly. It jsut will look like it is not.

No biggie. I'd be happy to test it out for you as well to give additional verification - to make sure that RCS does operate properly when docked, even if it looks incorrect.

Amazing how just a few small changes and details makes the craft even more amazing

tired of bouncing when you land? no longer as much of an issue.

Btw, I noticed this little comment before, but I wanted to clarify: Are you saying that the next update will have landing legs with shock absorbers? If so, awesome!!

yeah sure w/e.. lol

today i did soem stuff to RCS code... basically jsut make it turn off if it is not aligned. but i asked some people stuff and could make it function like normal RCS if i wanted to but it would be a good bit of work. so i will just wait lol...

I also redid the Seating bracket. Made it a tad beefier. Note the Pilot seat is now reversed so the IVA scene should be easier to fly in.
Lookin' good! This + RPM = Things I can't say in this forum
Thanks for retuning the Dragon CBBP. Looking forward to flying the new version.
Saw pictures of the original thing, and i keep thinking you did a great job on the accuracy
Got a version compatible with .23 yet? Just downloaded from SpacePort and the ships are not compatible. I need some escape modules for my space station!

Iam working on it.

I finished cockpit design today. it is simple but it will work. SpaceX stuff seems pretty clean and simple.

Got a version compatible with .23 yet? Just downloaded from SpacePort and the ships are not compatible. I need some escape modules for my space station!

You can also just put it together yourself. It's not that hard, if you take a few minutes to get it to know, you can assemble it in half a minute.
Did you check the .craft and make sure it was version=.23 instead of .22, if you do that they will load properly
at the bottom of the Op i added a link to Download the IVA scene. I figure if anyone comes up with a decent texture or prop arrangement I will edit it a bit and ship it with the Dragon.

well i had an update for Dragon but.... KSPSP update button does nothing so.....

Edit: the button does nothing but then 5 minutes later pop up said it did do something...

so Updated

It is not inserted onto the research tree yet...

It is not inserted onto the research tree yet...

no? :/ damn must have messed that up lol.

no? :/ damn must have messed that up lol.

I think spaceport is messed up. If I try to download, it is offering me uploads_2013_09_Dragon-4.0.zip, which is the previous release.

I think spaceport is messed up. If I try to download, it is offering me uploads_2013_09_Dragon-4.0.zip, which is the previous release.

Yep, it's the exact same file I already have.

try now. it should be 5.0 now.

KSPSP is so messed up...

Been waiting for this update for a while...Downloading...testing...LOVING!

Jed and friends Approve.

This was done without parachutes or a Radar Altimeter...Only mod is this one.

try now. it should be 5.0 now.

KSPSP is so messed up...

Yeah, space port is finally serving the right file. Thanks.
How hard would it be to scale the dragon up to work on top of 3.75m components?

How hard would it be to scale the dragon up to work on top of 3.75m components?

It looks like it already might. It's certainly larger than the 2.5m tanks.
